title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical 

Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (technical measures) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 520 
of 2019) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by the insertion after “19 July 2022” in 
the definition of “Council Regulation” (as amended by the Sea-Fisheries 
(Technical Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 13 of 2023)) of 
the following: “, Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/491 of 30 
November 2023 and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/492 of 30 
November 2023”. 

1 OJ L 318, 7.12.1984, p. 23 
2 OJ L 90, 2.4.1987, p. 29 
3 OJ L 203, 15.7.1989, p. 21 
4 OJ L 46, 16.2.2007, p. 9 
5 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
6 OJ L 2024/491, 13.02.2024 
7 OJ L 2024/492, 13.02.2024 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) (Amendment) Regulations 

2023 (S.I. No. 13 of 2023) are revoked. 

[715] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2024. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [715]

title: purpose of giving further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 3440/84
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument amends the Sea-Fisheries (Technical Measures) Regulations 
2019 (S.I. No. 520 of 2019) to give effect to (a) Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2024/491 of 30 November 2023 as regards as regards specific 
technical measures for red seabream (Pagellus bogaraveo) in ICES subareas 6 
to 8 and (b) Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/492 of 30 November 
2023 as regards the prolongation of technical measures for certain demersal and 
pelagic fisheries in the Celtic Sea, the Irish Sea and West of Scotland. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [715] 5
